lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: Wowza, that was exhilarating! It's getting HOT in the stadium!

lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: Close dodges and collisions like that make the crowd go WILD!

lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: See? Fill up our newly patented HYPE METER and who knows what'll happen! Show us what you got, Nuck Chorris!

lines.name: Tom
lines.text: I said I'm not Nuck Chorris!

lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: Behold, the great NUCK CHORRIS! Legendary Earthling fighter extaordinare!

lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: Mr. Chorris, I'm pleased to say that you're on the greatest stage this side of the Milky Way!

lines.name: Tom
lines.text: What!? I'm not Nuck Chorris! Who are you? Are you an alien?

lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: No need to be humble, Mr. Chorris - we're your biggest fans! YOU'RE the real star of this show!

lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: Ohoho, looks like two of our greatest fighters have arrived!

lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: Can our dear Nuck Chorris DODGE their attacks by pressing [Space] or [Right Trigger?]?
